description:
This low-cut shoe is most definitely at home in the Dolomites, whether trekking around the Tre Cime or relaxing in the Alpe di Siusi.

Its breathable recycled cotton and hemp canvas upper is lightweight and airy – ideal for use in warmer conditions. To provide extra protection, we equip it with a full 360° TPU rand.

The Pomoca Speed MTN Path outsole ensures enhanced precision during light hiking and approach activities. The 3F system with nylon-coated Kevlar® cables provides additional support and greater stability at the heel, while ensuring a precise fit. And the dual-density eco Ortholite® footbed promotes superior cushioning and moisture management. Moreover, this shoe shows our commitment to sustainable manufacturing.

The lightest member of our Wildfire family, designed to keep feet cool during summer hiking and offer climbing capability for rugged mountain use.
name: Salewa Wildfire Canvas - Mens
